text: COSRX Snail Mucin essence is a game changer for my dry sensitive skin. The snail mucin + hyaluronic acid combo keeps my face hydrated all day. Been using it for 3 weeks and my redness is almost gone. Way better than the Missha one I tried before.
author: skincare_junkie92

text: Tried the Beauty of Joseon Glow Serum with propolis and niacinamide. My dark spots are fading after 2 months! I have oily acne-prone skin and this doesn't break me out. Bought it on Olive Young for 12000 won. Glass skin goals achieved!
author: k_beauty_fan

text: Honestly disappointed with Innisfree Green Tea Seed Serum. Contains green tea extract and hyaluronic acid but did nothing for my dehydrated combination skin. The texture is nice but after 1 month zero improvement in my fine lines. Switched to Laneige Water Bank instead.
author: honest_reviewer88

text: Morning routine: Heimish All Clean Balm (first cleanser) → COSRX Low pH Cleanser → Klairs Supple Preparation Toner → Beauty of Joseon Glow Serum → COSRX Snail Mucin → Biore UV Aqua Rich sunscreen. This 6-step routine cured my acne and dark circles in 2 months! #skincareRoutine #kbeauty
author: routine_queen

text: Is the Anua Heartleaf toner really a dupe for Skin1004 Centella Toner? Both have centella asiatica but Anua adds heartleaf extract for extra calming. I have sensitive rosacea-prone skin and the Anua works better for my redness. Available on Coupang and Amazon. #kbeautydupe
author: compare_beauty
